attr.title: DAY OF DRIFT
attr.desc: DAY OF DRIFT is an arcade - style drifting racing game!
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3650050/DAY_OF_DRIFT/) and copy all files into the `assets` folder.
